action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Demand Satisfaction.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 3 + PB}, reach 5 ft {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 3 + PB}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Demand Satisfaction
entries: The warrior chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet and that can see or hear it. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 11 + PB}) or become {@condition Taunted|J:General} by the warrior for one minute (save ends). The condition ends early if the duelist attacks another creature, targets another creature with this action or ends its turn more that 60 feet from the target.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the warrior is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to gain a PB bonus to its AC against the attack, potentially turning a hit into a miss.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two weapon attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Demand Satisfaction.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 4 + PB}, reach 5 ft {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 4 + PB}, range 30/120 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Demand Satisfaction
entries: The warrior chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet and that can see or hear it. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 12 + PB}) or become {@condition Taunted|J:General} by the warrior for one minute (save ends). The condition ends early if the duelist attacks another creature, targets another creature with this action or ends its turn more that 60 feet from the target.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the warrior is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to gain a PB bonus to its AC against the attack, potentially turning a hit into a miss. If this causes the attack to miss, the attacker takes 4 ({@dice 1d6}) piercing damage provided it is within the reach or normal range of the warrior's weapons.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When the warrior is hit by an attack, it can use a reaction to gain a PB bonus to its AC against the attack, potentially turning a hit into a miss. If this causes the attack to miss, the attacker takes 11 ({@dice 3d6}) piercing damage provided it is within the reach or normal range of the warrior's weapons.

trait.name: Shield Wall
entries: Each creature of the warrior's choice within 5 feet gains an +1 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The warrior must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr mw, rw} {@hit 3 + PB}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 3 + PB}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition Prone}.

reaction.name: Sentinel's Strike
entries: When a creature the warrior can see enters its reach or makes an attack against a creature other than the warrior while within its reach, the warrior can make a special Opportunity Attack with its Spear.

trait.name: Shield Wall
entries: Each creature of the warrior's choice within 5 feet gains an +1 bonus to their AC and to their Strength and Dexterity saving throws. The warrior must be wielding a {@item Shield|XPHB} and not {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} to grant this bonus. A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

A creature can only benefit from this trait once at a time, even if multiple adjacent creatures have it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr mw, rw} {@hit 6 + PB}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  {@h}24 ({@damage 4d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 6 + PB}, reach 5 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition Prone}.

reaction.name: Sentinel's Strike
entries: When a creature the warrior can see enters its reach or makes an attack against a creature other than the warrior while within its reach, the warrior can make a special Opportunity Attack with its Spear.

trait.name: Kidnapping Attack
entries: Once per turn, when the warrior hits a creature that is its size or smaller with a weapon attack and it has advantage on the roll, it can {@action grapple} the target (escape {@dc 11 + PB}) and move up to 15 feet with it without consuming its movement or provoking oportunity attacks.

While {@condition Grappled|XPHB} in this way, the Grappled creature is also {@condition Silenced|XPHB} and the warrior cannot use this trait against another creature, however, the warrior can use the {@action Hide|XPHB} action with disadvantage, hiding both itself and the Grappled creature on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 3 + PB}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Daggers
entries: {@atkr mw,rw} {@hit 3 + PB}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The warrior takes the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB} or {@action Hide|XPHB} action.

trait.name: Kidnapping Attack
entries: Once per turn, when the warrior hits a creature that is its size or smaller with a weapon attack and it has advantage on the roll, it can {@action grapple} the target (escape {@dc 12 + PB}) and move up to 20 feet with it without consuming its movement or provoking oportunity attacks.

While {@condition Grappled|XPHB} in this way, the Grappled creature is also {@condition Silenced|XPHB} and the warrior cannot use this trait against another creature, however, the warrior can use the {@action Hide|XPHB} action with disadvantage, hiding both itself and the Grappled creature on a success.
